item.title: Comment by Martin Woodward+00:00
item.description:
It has been accepted by the Maven SCM project (http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/SCM-461)
As I understand it, you should be able to make use of the plug-in today by explicitly adding a dependency to the scm plugin (i.e. adding the following to your POM)
...
org.apache.maven.plugins maven-scm-plugin
org.apache.maven.scm maven-scm-provider-tfs 1.3-SNAPSHOT
...
This will automatically download and install the required jar and pom files. Alernatively you should be able to find it here:
https://repository.apache.org/content/groups/public/org/apache/maven/scm/maven-scm-provider-tfs/1.3-SNAPSHOT/
As you can see, it's a snapshot release, which will become part of the upcoming SCM 1.3 release.
item.dc:creator: Martin Woodward
